data.desc: Man, let me tell you some, this car is rock star! love it!
In 2017, I  crashed this car, which I loved like a star. It loved it man :(!
This car sucks, I had it for several years, and maaaan, i hate it wherever I see it
Well, it meh car, it isn't bad or good. It is normal, medium car to have
This car and love of my life are 2 thing I would recommend you to buy it
Never ever buy this car. Motor sucks, endgine sucks, everything is in a bad condition after 1 ride.
